attributes.action: Compulsary National Service for ALL school leavers
attributes.additional_details:
The title says it all.
Compulsary National Service for ALL school leavers.
The recent riots show (August 2011) without any question, the massive lack of respect and discipline that runs through the veins of the youth of today.
These young adults need to learn some respect for law  and order, but more importantly for their communities.
